attributes.action: Stop the UK support for the sale of Ivory to China
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to know why a ban that has been in place for 19 years has now been lifted and will put thousands of innocent Elephants in danger of their lives. 1 in 12 Elephants is already slaughtered for it's tusks a rate higher than that which led to an International ban on selling ivory 19 years ago. Public support made the change in 1989 and hopefully we can do this again.
